text: fdhhbu 'iilaa "msr", falamaa dakhaluu ealaa yusif qalu: ya 'ayuha aleaziz asabna wa'ahlana alqht waljdb, wjynak bithaman rdy' qlyl, faetna bih ma kunt tetyna min qibal balthmn aljyd, wtsddaq ealayna bqbd hadhih aldrahm almzjat wtjwwaz fyha, 'iina allah taealaa ythyb almtfddilyn ela ahl alhajat bamwalhm
